Package io.yamyamiya.telegram.bot.controllers.admin

Class AdminMessageController

java.lang.Object
io.yamyamiya.telegram.bot.controllers.admin.AdminMessageController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/admin/message") public class AdminMessageController extends Object
Entry point for admin functionality related to messages. Uses methods described in MessageService
